com.ibasco.agql.core.exceptions

Class MessengerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.ibasco.agql.core.exceptions.AgqlRuntimeException
            • com.ibasco.agql.core.exceptions.MessengerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @ApiStatus.Internal
public class MessengerException
extends AgqlRuntimeException

    Represents a transaction error. Provides the underlying context that was used for the transaction. This should not be made available to the user. Concrete messengers should wrap this exception to avoid exposing the context to the user.

    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getContext

        public final <C extends NettyChannelContext> C getContext()
        The underlying NettyChannelContext used for this transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        C - a C class
        Returns:
        The NettyChannelContext that was used for this transaction. null if the exception occured before a context has been acquired.
